meanings.sent1: Her blood's coagulability helped her heal quickly after the injury.
meanings.sent2: The doctor checked the patient's coagulability before the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The vampire's coagulability was so strong, it made him the best at healing wounds.
meanings.sent4: The coagulability of the glue was so impressive that it bonded the pieces instantly.
meanings.sent5: The coagulability of the chocolate sauce made it perfect for decorating cakes.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being able to coagulate.
meanings.sent1: The coagulability of the milk made it perfect for making cheese.
meanings.sent2: The coagulability of the mixture determined its effectiveness in stopping bleeding.
meanings.sent3: The magician's spell had such coagulability that it turned water into jelly.
meanings.sent4: The coagulability of the situation was so intense that it brought everyone together in unity.
meanings.sent5: The coagulability of the paint made it easy to create textured surfaces.
